mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zymx_his ( charge_code, charge_name, charge_class, charge_price, charge_quantity, charge_sum, dept_code, exec_dept_code, exec_dept_code2, doct_code, exec_doctor_code, nurse_dept_code, patient_code, visit_id, date_time) VALUES ( #{CHARGE_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CHARGE_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CHARGE_CLASS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CHARGE_PRICE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CHARGE_QUANTITY,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{CHARGE_SUM,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{DEPT_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EXEC_DEPT_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EXEC_DEPT_CODE2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DOCT_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EXEC_DOCTOR_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NURSE_DEPT_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PATIENT_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{VISIT_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cast(#{DATE_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS DATETIME) )
